custom-sql.sql: Select eu.* from esfuser eu join user_ u on u.userId= eu.esfUserId join esfcard c on c.esfUserId=u.userId join esfentitystate e on c.esfcardId = e.classPK join organization_ o on o.organizationId=c.esfOrganizationId where u.lastName like ? and u.firstName like ? and o.treePath LIKE ? and e.esfStateId = ? and c.esfcardId = e.classPK and e.endDate is null and e.className = 'it.ethica.esf.model.ESFCard' and c.code_ LIKE ? order by u.lastName, u.firstName

select distinct test.* from (SELECT eu.* FROM user_ u,esfuser eu,esfcard c,esfentitystate e,organization_ o WHERE u.userId = eu.esfUserId AND c.esfuserid=eu.esfUserId AND c.esfcardId = e.classPK AND e.className = 'it.ethica.esf.model.ESFCard' AND c.esforganizationId=o.organizationId
AND u.lastName LIKE ? AND u.firstName LIKE ? AND o.treePath LIKE ? AND c.code_ LIKE ? order by u.lastName, u.firstName, c.code_) test

Select eu.* from user_ u, esfuser eu where u.lastName like ? and u.firstName like ? and eu.fiscalCode like ? and u.userId in (Select esfUserId from esfcard c, esfentitystate e where esforganizationId in (select organizationId from organization_ o where o.treePath LIKE ?) and e.esfStateId = ? and c.esfcardId = e.classPK and e.endDate is null and e.className = 'it.ethica.esf.model.ESFCard' ) and u.userId = eu.esfUserId order by u.lastname, u.firstname, eu.fiscalCode

Select eu.* from esfuser eu, user_ u,esfcard c, esfentitystate e, esfentitystate e1, esfuseresfuserrole uur where c.esforganizationId in (select organizationId from organization_ o where o.treePath LIKE ?) and e.esfStateId = ? and e.className = 'it.ethica.esf.model.ESFCard' and c.esfcardId = e.classPK and e.endDate is null and e1.esfStateId = ? and e1.className = 'it.ethica.esf.model.ESFUser' and c.esfUserId = e1.classPK and e1.endDate is null and c.esfUserId= uur.esfUserId and uur.esfUserRoleId= ? and eu.esfUserId= c.esfUserId and u.userId = eu.esfUserId order by u.lastname, u.firstname, eu.fiscalCode

Select c.* from esfentitystate e, esfcard c, organization_ o where c.esfcardid = e.classPk and c.esforganizationid=o.organizationid and e.classname = 'it.ethica.esf.model.ESFCard' and e.endDate is null and e.esfstateid= 1 and o.treePath like ?
SELECT c.* FROM esfcard c ,esfentitystate e where c.esfCardId = e.classPK and e.endDate is null and e.esfStateId = ? and c.esfOrganizationId = ?

Select c.* from esfentitystate e, esfcard c, organization_ o where c.esfcardid = e.classPk and c.esforganizationid=o.organizationid and e.classname = 'it.ethica.esf.model.ESFCard' and e.endDate is null and e.esfstateid = 1 and c.esfuserid = 0 and o.treePath like ?

Select c.* from esfentitystate e, esfcard c where c.esfcardid = e.classPk
and e.classname = 'it.ethica.esf.model.ESFCard' and e.endDate is null and e.esfstateid = 1 and c.esfuserid = 0 and c.esfOrganizationId = 0

SELECT * FROM esfcard where esfcard.esfCardId in( SELECT e.classPK FROM esfentitystate e where e.className = 'it.ethica.esf.model.ESFCard' and e.esfStateId = 1 and e.endDate is null and e.classPK in( select c.esfCardId FROM .esfcard c where c.esfUserId = ? ) )

Select g.* from esfgunuser g, user_ u where u.userId = g.esfUserId
and u.firstName like ? and u.lastName like ? and g.esfGunId = ? and g.type_ = 1

Select g.*
from esfgunuser g, user_ u where u.userId = g.esfUserId
and u.firstName like ? and u.lastName like ? and g.type_ = 1

Select g.*
from esfgunuser g, user_ u, esfcane c where u.userId = g.esfUserId
and u.firstName like ? and u.lastName like ? and c.esfGunKindId = ? and c.esfCaneId = g.esfGunId and g.type_ = 2

Select g.*
from esfgunuser g, user_ u, esfcane c where u.userId = g.esfUserId
and u.firstName like ? and u.lastName like ? and c.esfCaneId = g.esfGunId and g.type_ = 2

select eu.*
from esfuser eu , user_ u
where eu.esfUserId = u.userId and u.firstName like ? and u.lastName like ?
and eu.esfUserId in( select ur.esfUserId from esfuseresfuserrole ur where (ur.esfUserRoleId = ? and ur.esfOrganizationId = ? and ur.endDate is null) )

Select u.*
FROM esfuser u, user_ us
where u.esfUserId = us.userId and upper(us.firstName) like upper(?) and upper(us.lastName) like upper(?) and upper(u.fiscalCode) like upper(?) and u.esfUserId in( Select ur.esfUserId FROM esfuseresfuserrole ur where ( ur.endDate is null and ur.esfOrganizationId = ? and ur.esfUserRoleId in ( select ru.esfUserRoleId FROM esfuserrole ru where ( ru.isBDO = 0 ) ) ) ) and u.esfUserId not in ( Select nd.esfUserId FROM esfnationaldelegation nd where ( nd.esfMatchId = ? ) )
SELECT ur.* FROM esfuseresfuserrole ur where ur.esfUserId = ? and ur.endDate is null and ur.esfUserRoleId in( SELECT ru.esfUserRoleId FROM esfuserrole ru where ru.isBDO = 0 )
select e.* from esfuseresfuserrole e where (e.esfOrganizationId = ? AND e.esfUserRoleId = ? AND (e.endDate is null OR e.endDate >= ? ))

Select u.*
FROM esfuser u, user_ us
where u.esfUserId = us.userId and upper(us.firstName) like upper(?) and upper(us.lastName) like upper(?) and upper(u.fiscalCode) like upper(?) and u.esfUserId in( Select ur.esfUserId FROM esfuseresfuserrole ur where ( ur.endDate is null and ur.esfUserRoleId in ( select ru.esfUserRoleId FROM esfuserrole ru where ( ru.isBDO = 0 ) ) ) ) and u.esfUserId not in ( Select p.esfUserId FROM esfpartecipant p where ( p.esfMatchId = ? ) )

SELECT m.* FROM esfmatch m
where ( and m.isNational = 1 and m.esfMatchId in (
SELECT nd.esfMatchId FROM esfnationaldelegation nd where ( nd.esfUserId = ? and nd.esfPartecipantTypeId = 1
) ) )

SELECT distinct eu.* FROM esfuser eu join user_ u on u.userId = eu.esfUserId join esfcard c on c.esfUserId = u.userId join esfentitystate e on e.classPK = c.esfCardId join esforganization eo on eo.esfOrganizationId = c.esfOrganizationId join organization_ o on o.organizationId = c.esfOrganizationId
where e.className='it.ethica.esf.model.ESFCard' and e.esfstateid=1 and eo.type_=3 and o.treePath like ? and e.enddate is null and e.startDate > ? and e.esfStateId = 1 and c.esfUserid not in( SELECT distinct c.esfUserId FROM user_ u join esfcard c on c.esfUserId = u.userId join esfentitystate e on e.classPK = c.esfCardId join esforganization eo on eo.esfOrganizationId = c.esfOrganizationId join organization_ o on o.organizationId = c.esfOrganizationId
where e.className='it.ethica.esf.model.ESFCard' and (e.enddate %lt; ? and e.startDate > ?) and o.organizationid=eo.esforganizationid and c.esforganizationid=eo.esforganizationid and eo.type_=3 and o.treePath like ? and c.esfcardid=e.classPk
)

SELECT distinct eu.* FROM esfuser eu join user_ u on u.userId = eu.esfUserId join esfcard c on c.esfUserId = u.userId join esfentitystate e on e.classPK = c.esfCardId join esforganization eo on eo.esfOrganizationId = c.esfOrganizationId join forganization_ o on o.organizationId = c.esfOrganizationId where e.className='it.ethica.esf.model.ESFCard' and (e.endDate %lt;= ? and e.startDate >= ? ) and o.organizationid=eo.esforganizationid and c.esforganizationid=eo.esforganizationid and eo.type_=3 and o.treePath like ? and c.esfcardid=e.classPk and c.esfUserid in( SELECT distinct
c.esfUserId FROM esfcard c join esfentitystate e on e.classPK = c.esfCardId join user_ u on u.userId = c.esfUserId join esforganization eo on eo.esfOrganizationId = c.esfOrganizationId join organization_ o on o.organizationId = c.esfOrganizationId
where e.className='it.ethica.esf.model.ESFCard' and e.esfstateid=1 and eo.type_=3 and o.treePath like ? and e.enddate is null and e.startDate >= ? and e.esfStateId = 1
)

SELECT * FROM esfshooteraffiliationchrono esac
where esac.year in (?) and substr(esac.card,1,2) = ?

SELECT distinct u.* FROM esfuser u join esfcard c on c.esfUserId = u.esfUserId join user_ eu on eu.userId = u.esfUserId join esfentitystate e on e.classPK = c.esfCardId join esforganization eo on eo.esfOrganizationId = c.esfOrganizationId join organization_ o on o.organizationId = c.esfOrganizationId
where e.className='it.ethica.esf.model.ESFCard' and eo.type_=3 and o.treePath like ? and e.startDate >= ? and e.endDate <= ?

SELECT distinct u.* FROM esfuser u join esfcard c on c.esfUserId = u.esfUserId join user_ eu on eu.userId = u.esfUserId join esfentitystate e on e.classPK = c.esfCardId join esforganization eo on eo.esfOrganizationId = c.esfOrganizationId join organization_ o on o.organizationId = c.esfOrganizationId
where e.className='it.ethica.esf.model.ESFCard' and e.esfstateid=1 and eo.type_=3 and o.treePath like ? and e.enddate is null and e.startDate >= ? and e.esfStateId = 1
SELECT c.* FROM esfentitystate e,esfcard c,esfuser u WHERE c.esfcardid = e.classPk AND c.esfuserid = u.esfuserid AND e.classname = 'it.ethica.esf.model.ESFCard' and esfStateId= ? and u.esfuserid= ?

SELECT c.* FROM esfentitystate e,esfcard c WHERE c.esfcardid = e.classPk AND e.classname = 'it.ethica.esf.model.ESFCard' and c.esfuserid= ? and esfStateId= 1 AND (endDate is null or endDate in(SELECT max(endDate) FROM esfentitystate e, esfcard c WHERE c.esfcardid = e.classPk AND e.classname = 'it.ethica.esf.model.ESFCard' and esfStateId= 1 AND endDate is not null and c.esfuserid= ?))

SELECT eu.* FROM user_ u left join esfcard c on c.esfUserId = u.userId left join esfentitystate es on es.classPK = c.esfCardId left join organization_ o on o.organizationId = c.esfOrganizationId left join esfuser eu on eu.esfUserId = u.userId
where
es.className = 'it.ethica.esf.model.ESFCard' and es.endDate is null and c.esfOrganizationId in ( select o.organizationId from organization_ o where o.treePath like ? ) and u.firstName like ? and u.lastName like ? and c.code_ like ?

SELECT distinct eu.* FROM esfuser eu left join user_ u on u.userId = eu.esfUserId left join esfcard c on c.esfUserId = eu.esfUserId where eu.esfUserId not in ( SELECT esfuser.esfuserId FROM esfuser esfuser left join user_ user on user.userId = esfuser.esfUserId left join esfcard c on c.esfUserId = esfuser.esfUserId left join esfentitystate e on e.classPK = c.esfCardId where e.className = 'it.ethica.esf.model.ESFCard' and e.endDate is null and e.startDate > ? ) and eu.esfUserId not in ( SELECT classPK FROM esfentitystate where className = 'it.ethica.esf.model.ESFUser' and esfStateId = 2 ) AND u.lastName LIKE ? AND u.firstName LIKE ? AND c.code_ LIKE ?

SELECT c.* FROM esfcard c left join esfentitystate e on e.classPK = c.esfCardId where c.code_ = ? and e.className = 'it.ethica.esf.model.ESFCard' and e.startDate %lt; ? and ( e.endDate is null or e.endDate > ? )and e.esfStateId = 1
SELECT distinct r.descGroupRanking FROM esfresult r where esfMatchId = ?
SELECT * FROM esfresult where esfMatchId = ? and descGroupRanking LIKE ?

SELECT n.* FROM esfnational n where n.endDate > ? and n.startDate > ? and n.esfSportTypeId = ? and n.userId not in( select nd.esfUserId FROM esfnationaldelegation nd where nd.esfMatchId = ? and nd.esfPartecipantTypeId = ? and nd.esfSportTypeId = ? )

SELECT distinct eu.* FROM esfuser eu join user_ u on u.userId = eu.esfUserId join esfcard c on c.esfUserId = eu.esfUserId join esfnational n on n.esfUserId = eu.esfUserId join esfentitystate es on es.classPK = c.esfCardId where u.firstName like ? and u.lastName like ? and c.code_ like ? and c.esfcardId = es.classPK and es.className = 'it.ethica.esf.model.ESFCard' and es.endDate is null and es.esfStateId= 1 and eu.esfUserId not in ( Select n.userId from esfnational n where n.endDate > CURDATE() and n.esfSportTypeId = ? )

SELECT count(distinct eu.esfUserId) FROM esfuser eu join user_ u on u.userId = eu.esfUserId join esfcard c on c.esfUserId = eu.esfUserId join esfnational n on n.esfUserId = eu.esfUserId join esfentitystate es on es.classPK = c.esfCardId where u.firstName like ? and u.lastName like ? and c.code_ like ? and c.esfcardId = es.classPK and es.className = 'it.ethica.esf.model.ESFCard' and es.endDate is null and es.esfStateId= 1 and eu.esfUserId not in ( Select n.userId from esfnational n where n.endDate > CURDATE() and n.esfSportTypeId = ? )
SELECT * FROM esfentitystate where classPK in ( select c.esfCardId from esfcard c where c.esfUserId = ? ) and className = 'it.ethica.esf.model.ESFCard' order by endDate DESC

SELECT Distinct shDr.* FROM esfshootingdirector shDr left join user_ u on u.userId = shDr.esfUserId left join esfcard c on c.esfUserId = shDr.esfUserId left join esfentitystate es on es.classPK = c.esfCardId
where es.className ='it.ethica.esf.model.ESFCard' and UPPER(u.lastName) like ? and UPPER(u.firstName) like ? and UPPER(c.code_) like ? and ([$REGIONS_IDS$]) and ([$SDQ_IDS$]) and ([$ST_IDS$])

SELECT distinct eu.* FROM esfuser eu left join user_ u on u.userId = eu.esfUserId left join esfcard c on c.esfUserId = eu.esfUserId left join esfnational n on n.esfUserId = eu.esfUserId where UPPER(u.lastName) like ? and UPPER(u.firstName) like ? and UPPER(c.code_) like ? and eu.esfUserId not in ( Select n.userId from esfnational n where n.endDate > CURDATE() and n.esfSportTypeId = ? )

SELECT distinct count(eu.esfUserId) FROM esfuser eu left join user_ u on u.userId = eu.esfUserId left join esfcard c on c.esfUserId = eu.esfUserId left join esfnational n on n.esfUserId = eu.esfUserId where UPPER(u.lastName) like ? and UPPER(u.firstName) like ? and UPPER(c.code_) like ? and eu.esfUserId not in ( Select n.userId from esfnational n where n.endDate > CURDATE() and n.esfSportTypeId = ? )
SELECT * FROM esfshooteraffiliationchrono chrono where chrono.affiliationDate BETWEEN ? AND ?

select eu.* FROM esfuser eu left join user_ u on u.userId = eu.esfUserId left join esfshootingdirector sd on sd.esfUserId = eu.esfUserId where UPPER(u.lastName) like ? and UPPER(u.firstName) like ? and ([$SDQ_IDS$]) and sd.esfUserId not in ( SELECT nd.esfUserId FROM esfnationaldelegation nd where nd.esfPartecipantTypeId = ? and nd.esfMatchId = ? ) group by eu.esfUserId

Select uc.* FROM esfusercategory uc left join contact_ c on c.classPK = uc.esfUserId where YEAR(c.birthday) > ? and uc.esfUserCategoryId not in ( select uc1.esfUserCategoryId FROM esfusercategory uc1 where YEAR(uc1.startDate) >= ? );
SELECT u.* FROM esfUser u left join contact_ c on c.classPK = u.esfUserId where YEAR(c.birthday) > ? and u.esfUserId not in ( select uc.esfUserId from esfusercategory uc )

select eu.* from esfuser eu left join user_ u on u.userId = eu.esfUserId left join esfusercategory uc on uc.esfUserId = u.userId left join contact_ c on c.classPK = uc.esfUserId where YEAR(uc.startDate) = ? and esfCategoryId = ? order by u.lastName

select distinct eu.* FROM esfUser eu left join user_ u on u.userId = eu.esfUserId left join esfcard c on c.esfUserId = eu.esfUserId left join esfentitystate es on es.classPK = c.esfCardId where UPPER(u.lastName) like ? and UPPER(u.FirstName) like ? and c.esfOrganizationId = ? and es.endDate is null and es.className = 'it.ethica.esf.model.ESFCard' and eu.esfUserId not in ( select ur.esfUserId from esfuseresfuserrole ur where ur.esfOrganizationId = ? and ur.endDate is null and ur.esfUserRoleId in( select r.esfUserRoleId from esfuserrole r where r.isBDO =1 ) ) order by u.lastName

SELECT o.* FROM esforganization o left join esfentitystate es on es.classPK = o.esfOrganizationId where o.type_= 3 and es.className='it.ethica.esf.model.ESFOrganization' and es.endDate is null and es.esfStateId = 1 and o.includeConiReport = 1 order by o.code_

SELECT o.* FROM esforganization o left join esfentitystate es on es.classPK = o.esfOrganizationId where o.type_= 3 and es.className='it.ethica.esf.model.ESFOrganization' and es.endDate is null and es.esfStateId = 1 and o.includeConiReport = 1 and o.esfOrganizationId not in (select assId from esfannualconireport where year = ?) order by o.code_

SELECT distinct eu.* FROM esfuser eu left join user_ u on u.userId = eu.esfUserId left join esfcard c on c.esfUserId = eu.esfUserId left join esfentitystate es on es.classPK = c.esfCardId left join organization_ o on o.organizationId = c.esfOrganizationId where es.className ='it.ethica.esf.model.ESFCard' and o.organizationId = ? and UPPER(u.firstName) like ? and UPPER(u.lastName) like ? and UPPER(c.code_) like ? order by lastName,firstName
